entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of light snow or ice pellets beginning in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
